name: WKInterfaceTextField
desc: An interface element that displays an editable text area.

items.name: func setTextContentType(WKTextContentType?)
items.desc: Sets the text field’s semantic meaning.

items.name: struct WKTextContentType
items.desc: Constants that specify a text field’s semantic meaning.

items.name: func setText(String?)
items.desc: Sets the text displayed by the text field.

items.name: func setAttributedText(NSAttributedString?)
items.desc: Sets the styled text displayed by the text field.

items.name: func setAttributedPlaceholder(NSAttributedString?)
items.desc: Sets the text field’s placeholder using styled text.

items.name: func setEnabled(Bool)
items.desc: Enables or disables the text field.

items.name: func setSecureTextEntry(Bool)
items.desc: Determines whether the text field hides the text entered by the user.
